data.title: Great selections more than TEA
data.text: This shop has everything--chocolate, preserves, scone mixes, organic soup mixes, teapots, coffee pots, COFFEE in all spectrums and of course EVERY TEA your palate craves.  Mix and match for your next gift basket.  Loved our visit.  Near campus of U of Illinois. Just finished baking the red raspberry scones!! Easy and lovely.
